test.name: 1) User can serch for product

kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.
